name: Agri-Fab 130 lb. Tow Spreader with Pneumatic Tires
description: With a commercial-grade gearbox and easy-set controls, the Agri-Fab , Smart Spreader 130 lb. Tow Spreader is designed to be towed by a lawn tractor in order to spread ice melt, fertilizer and seed up to a 12 ft. spread width. The spreader holds up to 130 lb. of product and features a hitch that is compatible with most lawn tractors.Holds up to 130 lb. of seed, fertilizer and ice melt for performance flexibilityCommercial-grade gearbox with aluminum-beveled gear for durabilityPneumatic tires provide great maneuverabilityUp to a 12 ft. spread width for relaible coverageHitch fits most lawn tractors for near universal compatibility3 year limited warranty
